txt_intro_001: It was our first Valentine's Day together, and I wanted to surprise Laura with a really impressive date.
txt_intro_002: Therefore, I invited her to a special candlelight dinner.
txt_intro_003: Although I had told her it would be an upscale restaurant and we should dress appropriately, I had not told her that it was the 'Monte Vesuvio.'
txt_intro_004:
The 'Vesuvio,' as it was also called, was one of the most popular restaurants in Trinity, so it was hard to get a reservation, especially on a day like Valentine's Day.
But that did not apply to me, and the reason was the real surprise I had for Laura that evening.
